data.question: What is the publication year of the article titled 'Synthesis and Structures of Extended-Chain Metal-Alkylidyne Compounds'?
Who are the authors of the article discussing the synthesis and structures of extended-chain metal-alkylidyne compounds?
data.answer: Timothy P. Pollagi, Steven J. Geib, and Michael D. Hopkins

data.question: What type of polymers are discussed in the article by Pollagi and colleagues?
data.answer: Conjugated polymers composed of alternating organic and transition-metal subunits
